description: Represents a key signing key (KSK) associated with a hosted zone. You can only have two KSKs per hosted zone.

HostedZoneId.description: The unique string (ID) used to identify a hosted zone.
HostedZoneId.markdownDescription:
The unique string (ID) used to identify a hosted zone.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^[A-Z0-9]{1,32}$  
Update requires: Replacement

Status.description: A string specifying the initial status of the key signing key (KSK). You can set the value to ACTIVE or INACTIVE.
Status.markdownDescription:
A string specifying the initial status of the key signing key (KSK). You can set the value to ACTIVE or INACTIVE.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: ACTIVE | INACTIVE  
Update requires: No interruption

Name.description: An alphanumeric string used to identify a key signing key (KSK). Name must be unique for each key signing key in the same hosted zone.
Name.markdownDescription:
An alphanumeric string used to identify a key signing key (KSK). Name must be unique for each key signing key in the same hosted zone.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9_]{3,128}$  
Update requires: Replacement

KeyManagementServiceArn.description: The Amazon resource name (ARN) for a customer managed key (CMK) in AWS Key Management Service (KMS). The KeyManagementServiceArn must be unique for each key signing key (KSK) in a single hosted zone.
KeyManagementServiceArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon resource name (ARN) for a customer managed key (CMK) in AWS Key Management Service (KMS). The KeyManagementServiceArn must be unique for each key signing key (KSK) in a single hosted zone.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: Replacement
